song.englishname: Hallelujah! What a Savior/When I Survey the Wondrous ...

english.segment1: "Man of sorrows", what a name. For the son of God who came. Ruined sinners to reclaim. Hallelujah, what a Savior
english.segment2: Bearing shame and scoffing rude. In my place condemned He stood. Sealed my pardon with His blood. Hallelujah, what a Savior
english.segment3: See, from His head. His hands, His feet. Sorrow and love flow mingled down. Did e'er such love and sorrow meet. Or thorns compose so rich a crown
english.segment4: Amazing love, How can it be?. That Thou my God shouldst die for me
english.segment5: Guilty, vile and helpless we. Spotless Lamb of God was He. Full atonement can it be?. Hallelujah, Hallelujah
english.segment6: Were the whole realm of nature mine. That were a present far too small. Love so amazing, so divine. Demands my soul, my life, my all
english.segment7: Amazing love, How can it be?. That Thou my God. The Almighty God. The Son of God shouldst die for me
